title: Goshintai-banner.png
description: This is a banner with a yellow and black striped background, similar to a caution or hazard sign. The black stripes are diagonal, slanting from the top left to the bottom right. Centered on the banner, in large black letters with a white outline, is the text "WELCOME TO GOSHINTAI". There is a solid black bar running along the bottom edge of the banner.
